review: I purchased both the Amazon fire stick and the AppleTV figuring I would put one in one room and the other one in another room.  I was not happy with the Apple TV  and returned it to get a second Amazon Fire Stick ( and I am an Apple person… iPhone, iPad, iPod ) but I felt the Amazon fire stick worked better (and was half the price!) The AppleTV could not pick up the signal in the bedroom, which is weaker than in the rest the house, but the Amazon Fire Stick had no problem. I also found so many things on the Apple TV cost extra money and there were so many free apps, movies, TV shows, etc on the Amazon Fire Stick. I started watching one of Amazons own TV shows, and when I couldn't find it on the Apple TV in the bedroom, I realized it was an Amazon show and not a Netflix show. That sealed the deal! I brought back the AppleTV and got a second Amazon Fire Stick. It's very easy to set up and I'm thrilled with it!

review: I am so excited about this.  It is just as described.  It was incredibly easy to install.  It walks you through step by step if you feel intimidated by technology.  I had no problems connecting to my wireless router.  The remote is small and very easy to use.  It uses symbols and no letters/numbers.  I high recommend this for a less expensive option to watch Amazon programming.
